title: Not All about Cavendish: The Retirement Class of ’24 Includes National Icons, Forgotten Super-Talents, and a Grand Tour Warhorse
content:
We all know Cavendish is retiring this winter. But which other headliners are hanging up their wheels? Here's part one of a two-part tribute to the retirement class of '24.

Read the full article at Not All about Cavendish: The Retirement Class of ’24 Includes National Icons, Forgotten Super-Talents, and a Grand Tour Warhorse on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
